name: SEARCH ALL - CHRISTMAS
description:
SEARCH ALL - CHRISTMAS

is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the Christmas candy in the form of a cane (caramel cane) on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling". The location depicts a winter city. In the foreground of the location is a railway, along which a locomotive periodically passes. Also in the foreground is a carousel with horses, and next to it children are making a snowman. In the middle there is a frozen pond where people are doing their favorite things, someone is skating, and someone is fishing. Between the front layer of the location and the back, there is a huge bridge along the entire settlement. In the background, a viewing wheel rotates and there is a large apartment building.

Key Features:
- Animation elements on location;
- "Doodling" design style;
- 80 caramel canes to find;
- Pleasant soundtrack:
- The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result.
